resources.string: 1. Possible without Read / Write permission\n2. Storage files disappear when app is deleted\n3. Read / Write impossible in other apps
1. Without Read / Write permission\n2. Store files disappear when you delete an app\n3. Read / Write in other apps
External Shared Storage\n(No Permission Required > Q)
1. No Read / Write Permission required\n2. Deleting apps doesn\'t disappears storage files\n3. Read / Write in other apps
1. No Read / Write Permission\n2. Deleting apps doesn\'t disappears storage files\n3. Read / Write in other apps

1. Possible without Read / Write Permission
2. Deleting app doesn't disappears storage files
3. Read / Write in other apps
4. Able to read/write nested Folders & Files
